Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.listener.remote

Interface NetworkEvent

All Superinterfaces:
GameEvent
All Known Subinterfaces:
UpdateEvent
All Known Implementing Classes:
BoardStateUpdateEvent, ChangePhaseEvent, ChangeScoreEvent, ChangeTurnEvent, CrashStateError, DeckEvent, DeckRevealEvent, DeckStateUpdateEvent, EndgameCheckEvent, FaceDownReplaceEvent, FreeCornersUpdate, IllegalActionError, IllegalGameAccessError, IllegalParameterError, IllegalStateError, IndirectDisconnectEvent, PingEvent, PlayAreaPlacedCardEvent, PlayAreaStateUpdate, PlayerDeadLockedEvent, PlayerEvent, PlayerHandAddCardEvent, PlayerHandAddObjectiveCardEvent, PlayerHandChooseObjectiveCardEvent, PlayerHandRemoveCardEvent, PlayerHandSetStartingCardEvent, PlayerHandStateUpdateEvent, PlayerRemovalEvent, PlayerStateUpdateEvent, RemoteErrorEvent, SetColorEvent, SetConnectEvent, SetTurnEvent, VisibleResourcesUpdateEvent
public interface NetworkEvent extends GameEvent
This interface extends game event and structures a network event.

Networks event are event that are to be sent over a network.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    executeEvent(VirtualClient virtualClient)
    Handles event and notifies the client about it.

  • Method Details

    • executeEvent

      void executeEvent(VirtualClient virtualClient) throws RemoteException
      Handles event and notifies the client about it.
      Parameters:
      virtualClient - client instance to be notified
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during notification
